name: The Last Dinner
description:
"The Last Dinner" is a horror experience based on virtual reality technology. The game uses the first perspective to bring an immersive horror experience. In the game, the player will use the handle to control the protagonist to explore the villa in the mountains, and unravel the horror secret buried in the villa in the guide.
"The Last Dinner" is a fun CG teacher who assisted six students in the animation department of Xi'an University of Science and Technology, from original painting design, model making to script development, to special effects and post-sound effects, and completed the VR game works in 6 months.
developers: 西安乐趣软件科技有限公司
publishers: 西安乐趣软件科技有限公司
